QuestData.Title: Lighting Up the Sky
QuestData.Description: Do you like fireworks, $Gsir:miss;?$B$BI love them! In older times we would set them off to frighten away demons, but I just like them because they're pretty!$B$BI think there are still some old launchers lying around the temple.$B$BWould you go set off some big fireworks for me? It would make me so happy!
QuestData.CompletionText: I love to see fireworks lighting up the sky!
QuestData.RewardText: Yay! I saw the fireworks all the way from over here!$B$BThank you so much, $n.
